title: Duplicate licenses
context: ยง183D-24 Duplicate licenses. Duplicate licenses may be issued upon application stating under oath that the original license has been lost or destroyed and upon payment of a fee of fifty per cent of the current cost of a resident license as provided in section 183D-22(b)(1). [L 1985, c 174, pt of ยง4; am L 1998, c 288, ยง1]
